text:
Currently, the scp task opens a new session for each file being transferred during the same task invocation (for example: if the scp task is called to transfer 20 files, then 20 sessions will be opened).

This is problematic when the scp task is used against sshd installations where the MaxSessions setting is not high enough.

Should add an attribute to the scp task to allow limiting the number of sessions being used.
